description: Deletes one or more remediation exceptions mentioned in the resource keys.

parameters.name: ConfigRuleName
parameters.description: The name of the Config rule for which you want to delete remediation exception configuration.

parameters.name: ResourceKeys
parameters.description: An exception list of resource exception keys to be processed with the current request. Config adds exception for each resource key. For example, Config adds 3 exceptions for 3 resource keys. (dict) --- The details that identify a resource within Config, including the resource type and resource ID. ResourceType (string) --- The type of a resource. ResourceId (string) --- The ID of the resource (for example., sg-xxxxxx).

nested_params.name: ResourceId
nested_params.description: The ID of the resource (for example., sg-xxxxxx).

nested_items.name: FailedBatches
nested_items.description: Returns a list of failed delete remediation exceptions batch objects. Each object in the batch consists of a list of failed items and failure messages.

nested_items.name: FailureMessage
nested_items.description: Returns a failure message for delete remediation exception. For example, Config creates an exception due to an internal error.

nested_items.name: FailedItems
nested_items.description: Returns remediation exception resource key object of the failed items.

nested_items.name: ResourceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the resource (for example., sg-xxxxxx).
